content.raw:
1. I suppose the docker and start simulation procedure is the same as for practice and simple tunnels, right?

Yes

2. The simulation is going to be performed after 10th October?

The simulation is performed when the submission takes place.

3. Is only one submission allowed or the latest one will be used? (“Each qualified team must submit a single solution to be scored.”)

Only one submission is allowed. There is a warning about this in the GUI.

4. Is there going to be only one tunnel or set of several examples? (rules rev3 says “unreleased scenarios” so probably more)

I can't say anything more than what is in the rules document.
